title: Youth unemployment rate in Ghana in 2019
summary: In general Youth unemployment rate has rose over the Year.
Youth unemployment rate is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Youth unemployment rate, about 14.1 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Youth unemployment rate about 9.35 was reached at Year 2007
min_summary: Overall Youth unemployment rate has increased over the Year.
Youth unemployment rate is roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2018.
